demand_oversight.title: Demanding Accountability
demand_oversight.description: Director Vale chuckles: 'Oversight? From whom - the Root Assembly that can't even keep track of its own delegates? The independents who can barely manage their own businesses? No, we prefer... self-regulation. Our word has always been our bond.' The other executives exchange meaningful glances.

choices.text: 'Self-regulation is what got us into this mess.'
'I want to see contracts and guarantees in writing.'
'This isn't a real negotiation. I'm leaving.'
